column5: TLRD Started a long position here For every dollar this Stock falls Ill unload some of my shares Made an entry at 620 Couldnt fill sub 620 I doubt that this company will go bankrupt any time soon They have too much cash on hand If the SP falls so be it Life is a gamble At this price odds are in the longs favor Investors panic sold today I scooped it up Calling your bluff bears
